entity.name: The
entity.subtitle: The Good God,Father of All
entity.description: Chief deity of the Tuatha D√© Danann, master of life and death, wielder of cosmic power. The Dagda embodies the archetype of the all-powerful father god - protector, provider, and wielder of absolute authority over the natural order.

relationships.allies: AllTuatha D√© Danann, particularlyLugh(champion), Ogma (brother and war companion), theMorrigan(through their sacred union)
relationships.enemies: The Fomorians (ancientenemiesof the gods), Bres (the unjust king), forces of chaos and sterility

family.parents: Son of Elatha, a Fomorian prince (in some accounts)
family.consorts: Boann (goddess of the River Boyne),the Morrigan(goddess of war),Danu(mother goddess)
family.children: Brigid(goddess of fire and poetry), Aengus √ìg (god of love and youth), Bodb Derg (later king of theTuatha D√© Danann), Cermait (father of smithing gods), Midir the Proud, Aed, and numerous others
family.siblings: Ogma (god of eloquence), variousTuatha D√© Dananndeities

archetype.name: ‚ö° SKY FATHER / ALL-FATHER
archetype.description: The Dagda embodies the All-Father archetype - supreme authority over life, death, and abundance.
